comments.body:
This is giving me a problem with an internal build:
```
    reduce_slice_sum = _reduce_slice_ops.reduce_slice_sum
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'reduce_slice_sum'
```
Is there an extra step necessary somewhere to expose the ops completely?

Hi @andrewharp, I didn't see any problem on this line on my computer. But I do see another problem on somewhere else. I added some more commits to my branch. See the file changes in:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/compare/master...zasdfgbnm:partial_reduces

Do you think this will fix the problem you are talking about?
